entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Pound Sign/Hashtag in Response File Breaks Deployments #30759
  • dotnet publish -p:PublishSingleFile fails with Unhandled exception on .net 7 it works on .net 6 #30758
  • Dotnet cannot resolve it's installed version while running dotnet run. #30748
  • [Bug]: Microsoft.NET.Sdk.targets(176,5): error MSB4018: The "GenerateDepsFile" task failed unexpectedly. #30755
  • System.Text.Json: The converter for derived type 'T' does not support metadata writes or reads. #30744

Closed

  • Build fails when using sdk version 7.0.100. #30735
  • dotnet new list ... - searchs project template tags #30127

PullRequests

Created

  • fix issue 30369 enable docker build platform switch #30762
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #30756
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 19.9.2 to 19.10.0 in /eng/dependabot #30746
    dependencies, dependabot: 7.0.3xx

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #30741
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 19.9.2 to 19.10.0 in /eng/dependabot #30747
    dependencies, dependabot: main
  • Enable Dependabot for branch release/7.0.3xx #30580
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add tests for Nuget restore post action with the argument files #30693

Updated

  • #28518: Stop generating NETSDK1138 warning when OutputType is Library. #30612
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [25961] - dotnet watch first key press fix #26870
    area-System.Console
  • [GenAPI] Add DocIdSymbolFilter for doc-id API exclusion. #30740
    Area-GenAPI
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2119615 #30714
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Revert MSBuild to match VS 17.5.0 GA #30674
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure, 7.0.2xx
  • [GenAPI] Synthesize an internal default constructor for the type with implicit default constructor and the base type without. #30594
    Area-GenAPI
  • Allow multiple loggers for VSTest command #30686
    Area-DotNet Test
  • Enable debugging log #30732
